name: ☁ Talking ben Vs ishowspeed Online!!! ☁
description:
i finally made this dumb game :/ it took me a while to make and i was working on it all night ;-;

WASD or arrows to move and E to open stuff and get stuff (also i dont think downloading the game will work ;-;)

                                   
                                                          Notes and Credits

all thanks to @Kiwbird1 for the awesome game :D

i made this game because of a game called "ishowspeed vs talking ben" and its a really awesome game so i decided to make a online version. if you want to play the real game then here is the link :D (its better) https://racing-moth.itch.io/ishowspeed-vs-talking-ben
